title: Product Registration Evidence Document
description: Evidence data for a registered eCommerce Product

category.title: A category for the product item.
examples: Example Product Category (required)

inProductGroupWithID.title: Indicates the productGroupID for a ProductGroup
examples: valid Product Group ID number per schema.org, could be NULL (required)

productID.title: Product ID
examples: Product number of registering Legal Entity such as an ISBN (required)

mpn.title: Manufacturer Part Number (MPN)
examples: Manufacturer part number (required)

gtin.title: Global Trade Item Number (GTIN)
examples: valid GTIN as number or URL per GS1 spec(required)

isAccessoryOrSparePartFor.title: Is accessory or sparepart for
examples: A pointer to another product (or multiple products) for which this product is an accessory or spare part; may be empty (required)

releaseDate.title: Release date of a product or product model
examples: date when product (version) was 1st released (required)

manufacturer.title: Manufacturer name or brand of the product
examples: name of the manufacturer (required)

globalLocationNumber.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
globalLocationNumber.description: A Global Location Number of the manufacturer issued by GS1 (required), for more information see http://www.gs1.org/gln.

leiCode.title: Global Location Number (GLN)
leiCode.description: A Legal Entity Identifier of the manufacturer issued bei GLEIF (required), for more information see https://gleif.org

name.title: Name of the product item
examples: short name of product (required)

description.title: Description of the product item
examples: Description of product (required)

model.title: Model of the product
examples: produdct model name, a URL is also allowed (required)

color.title: Color of the product
examples: color of product -- 'mix' is allowed (required)

material.title: Material the product is made from
examples: Material the product is made from, could specified as 'composits' (required)

weight.title: Weight of the product
examples: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (kg) (required)

height.title: Height of the product
examples: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (meter) (required)

width.title: Width of the product
examples: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (meter) (required)

depth.title: Depth of the Product
examples: floating point metric system value plus unit measrure (meter)(required)

url.title: Url or the product item
examples: URL of the product; could be empty (required)

isBasedOn.title: Is based on
examples: URI for the resource from which this work is derived e.g. patent or from which it is a modification or adaption; could be empty (required)

image.title: Image of the product
examples: encoded picture of the product as a URI/URL (required)
